function.name: sylvester
function.short: Solve Sylvester's equation ax + xb = c

long.para: This function solves for x. The first two parameters must be of the same size. The function works for real and complex quaternions.
It is possible for there to be no solution (singular case). If so, the return result will be NaNs.

references.reference: Drahoslava Janovska and Gerhard Opfer, 'Linear equations in quaternionic variables', Mitteilungen der Mathematischen Gesellschaft in Hamburg, 27, (2008), 223–234, Section 2. Available: https://www.math.uni-hamburg.de/mathges/
